 2019-11602019-08-07,  JUS,  ,  , 
ActJudges Act (Removal Allowance) Order
SubjectHon. Richard W. Elson ** Removal Allowance **
PrecisOrder prescribing the period beginning on September 5, 2018 and ending on March 4, 2019 as an additional period during which the difference between the sale price of the Honourable RICHARD W. ELSON's former residence and its fair market value be an expense for which a removal allowance shall be paid.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
